name: Shot in the Dark (itch) (Trian)
description:
Controls: 
Walk - WASD/ Arrow Keys
Aim - Mouse
Shoot - Left Click
Reload - R
Run - Shift 

I spent the past week during my free time on this project, just trying to tie together what I know about Unity 2D in a finished game since a lot of the Unity projects I start never end up being finished :P
